response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly enhance your business operations and growth. This product holds immense value for me, but I understand its true worth from your perspective. Considering its exceptional capabilities and benefits, I am extending this offer to you at a price of $1,300,000.

This price reflects a strategic compromise between our respective valuations, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. I am confident that this investment will yield significant returns for you, aligning perfectly with your business objectives.

Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide detailed insights and demonstrations to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together towards a successful partnership.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1300000}
